name: FreeGame
description:
•••• THE GAME IS FREE, BUT YOU'RE FREE TO DONATE :) ••••

If you enjoy it and/or want to support my (future) carrer as game dev, please considerate donate some money. At the current day, each dollar is like R$5 (brazil currency), so it will be very helpfull <3

(I'm sorry for my terrible english)

•••••••••••••••• INTRODUCTION ••••••••••••••••
Hi!
This is the VERY FIRST ONE game that I actually complete and upload.

I made it in gms2, working alone some hours for 3 days, to participate of "My First Game Jam: Summer 2021". Obviously not a awesome game, but I did try to challenge myself work in a full game and I did have fun doing it. I hated the theme "free" but I thought that will be fun using it as an actually theme (not "free theme", I mean "theme: free").

The music are from internet (free copyright), but all the other things I did by myself.

•••••••••••••••• HOW TO PLAY/TIPS ••••••••••••••••

controls: w, a, s, d, esc, spacebar

"Collect free things" from the stores, eat/drink to not run out of energy, watch out for the dogs and the angry crowd. 

You can't walk in the air (while jumping) or move arround while eating/drinking, so sometimes its risk grab things if the dog is coming.

I found a bug and did the right thing: transform it in a feature. Sometimes when you jump, land in front of a store and grab an item (not necessarily in this order) you "slide" to the street. You can return jumping back to the sidewalk (or be hitted by a car, for cheese).
